channel.title: The 1st Workshop on Human-Centered AI for SE
channel.description: Recent content on The 1st Workshop on Human-Centered AI for SE

item.title: Website Launch Announcement
item.description: We are thrilled to announce that the HumanAISE Workshop website is now live! Explore our mission, ongoing projects, and upcoming events focused on advancing human-centered AI in software engineering.

item.title: Introduction to HumanAI4SE
item.description: Explore the intersection of AI and Software Engineering, focusing on human-centered approaches to enhance developer productivity and uphold ethical standards.

item.title: Introduction to the Organizing Committee
item.description: Meet the dedicated team leading the HumanAISE Workshop, committed to advancing human-centered AI in software engineering.

item.title: Current Progress in Human-Centered AI for Software Engineering
item.description: Explore the latest advancements in integrating human-centered artificial intelligence within software engineering, focusing on ethical considerations, collaborative tools, and emerging research.

About Us Our Mission The HumanAISE Workshop is a dedicated initiative to bring together researchers, industry professionals, and thought leaders to explore the intersection of human-centered AI and software engineering. Our mission is to promote AI solutions that enhance human capabilities, uphold ethical standards, and foster collaboration between humans and AI in software engineering contexts. What We Do HumanAISE focuses on: Human-Centered AI: Developing AI systems that assist, empower, and support human decision-making without replacing developers.

item.title: Contact
item.description: Contact Us Reach Out to HumanAISE We welcome inquiries, feedback, and collaborations from researchers, industry professionals, and anyone interested in the advancement of human-centered AI in software engineering. Whether you have questions about our workshop, ideas to share, or want to learn more about our initiatives, please donâ€™t hesitate to get in touch. How to Contact You can reach the HumanAISE Workshop organizing team at: Email: humanai4se@gmail.com Our team is dedicated to fostering an open dialogue on the future of AI in software engineering.

item.title: Prose
item.description: The Human-Centered AI for Software Engineering (HumanAISE) Workshop Exploring AI and Human Collaboration in Software Engineering The HumanAISE workshop focuses on advancing AI systems that complement and enhance human capabilities within software engineering. By addressing key topics like human-guided AI, ethical AI practices, and human-machine collaboration, HumanAISE aims to create a future where AI serves as an empowering tool for developers rather than a replacement. Workshop Themes and Key Topics The workshop delves into several pressing areas:
